response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth surpasses $1,000,000, but for the sake of negotiation, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an exceptional chance to own something truly special. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you're interested in making an offer of your own.", "product_price": 950000}
